headline: Caterpillar Powers AI Data Centers While Valuation Reflects Rising Expectations
summary: Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) has agreed to supply 2 GW of advanced natural gas generator sets and battery storage for the Monarch Compute Campus. The Monarch Compute Campus is being developed as a large-scale hub for hyperscale and enterprise AI data centers. The agreement highlights Caterpillar's role in providing power solutions tailored to the needs of AI-focused infrastructure. Recent reports also point to record backlogs and growing demand for Caterpillar's power generation equipment linked...
